prompts.prompt: A visual representation of compound interest as a snowball effect. Show a large snowball rolling down a hill, gaining more snow (representing interest). The setting is a sunny hillside. Modern style with high contrast. Include black and white overlays for text. The color mood is optimistic and bright.
prompts.title: Make Your xMoney Work For You
prompts.body: Compound interest is when you earn interest on your initial money and the interest it's already earned. It's a snowball effect for your savings.

prompts.prompt: An infographic showing the growth of $100 at 10% interest over two years. The setting is a clean, minimalistic digital chart. Use modern design elements with high contrast and clearly defined areas. The color mood is motivating with greens and blues.
prompts.title: The Power of Starting Early
prompts.body: Invest $100 at 10% and get $110. The next year, you earn interest on the full $110. Starting early gives your money more time to grow.
